effects: Increase resistance to all status effects by 50%
name: Unwavering Body
Unwavering Body
不動之身
흔들림 없는 신체
Corps inébranlable
Standhaft
Cuerpo inamovible
desc_short: Boost resistance against poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and petrify
提高中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性的數值
독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승
Augmente la rés. à poi., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala. et pétri.
Erhöht Resist. gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein.
Aumenta la res. a ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie
desc_long: Boosts resistance to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone.
提高中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性的數值。
독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력이 상승합니다.
Augmente la rés. à poi., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala. et pétri.
Erhöht Resit. gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein.
Aumenta la resistencia a veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra.
